data.title: Meet The KiMo
data.meta_description: Get to know the KiMo Theatre.
data.text:
Location

The historic KiMo Theatre is located on the corner of Central Ave. and 5th St. in the heart of downtown Albuquerque at 423 Central Ave. NW, Albuquerque, NM 87102. (Map)

Parking

The KiMo Theatre does not have designated parking. Visitors may find parking in surrounding areas including metered parking along Central Ave. and paid parking in nearby lots and garages. A covered parking garage is located directly behind the theater at Copper Ave. and 5th St. (Map)

Accessibility

The KiMo Theater was built in 1927 and is a Registered Historic Landmark. Due to the original design and construction of the building, there are some limitations to accessibility. The main floor of the building is fully compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act and is accessible to all audience members and performers with four wheelchair and companion seating areas in the auditorium. The KiMo was built without an elevator, or any room to install one. The balcony and upper floors of the building may not be accessible to some persons due to the several flights of stairs.

Plan Your Visit

Watch a film, play or a variety of performance at the KiMo Theatre. Purchase tickets for upcoming shows at ABQtickets.com.

Take a tour of the theater during our free Meet The KiMo events. Check our ticketing website to see when the next opportunity is scheduled.

Love the KiMo

Visit the KiMo Theatre on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook to keep up with upcoming events!

Virtual Tour
